00050             function                register_template( $TemplateName , $TemplateVersion )
00051             {
00052                   try
00053                   {
00054                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00055                         $TemplateName = $Security->get( $TemplateName , 'string' );
00056                         $TemplateVersion = $Security->get( $TemplateVersion , 'string' );
00057                         
00058                         $Handle = fopen( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/data/template_list' , 'a+' );
00059                         
00060                         if( $Handle === false )
00061                         {
00062                               return( false );
00063                         }
00064                         
00065                         $TemplateInfo = $TemplateName.'#'.$TemplateVersion."\r\n";
00066                         
00067                         fwrite( $Handle , $TemplateInfo , strlen( $TemplateInfo ) );
00068                         
00069                         fclose( $Handle );
00070                   }
00071                   catch( Exception $e )
00072                   {
00073                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00074                   }
00075             }
00076             
00095             function                get_template_list()
00096             {
00097                   try
00098                   {
00099                         $RawTemplateList = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( 
00100                               dirname( __FILE__ ).'/data/template_list' , 'exploded'
00101                         );
00102                         
00103                         $TemplateList = array();
00104                         
00105                         foreach( $RawTemplateList as $rtl )
00106                         {
00107                               $rtl = str_replace( "\r" , '' , $rtl );
00108                               $rtl = str_replace( "\n" , '' , $rtl );
00109                               
00110                               $Trinity = explode( '#' , $rtl );
00111                               
00112                               $TemplateList [] = array( 
00113                                     'name' => $Trinity[ 0 ] , 'version' => $Trinity[ 1 ] , 'default' => $Trinity[ 2 ]
00114                               );
00115                         }
00116                         
00117                         return( $TemplateList );
00118                   }
00119                   catch( Exception $e )
00120                   {
00121                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00122                   }
00123             }
00124             
00143             function                draw_template_list()
00144             {
00145                   try
00146                   {
00147                         $List = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'templates_list_header.tpl' );
00148                         
00149                         $TemplateList = $this->get_template_list();
00150                         
00151                         if( $TemplateList === false )
00152                         {
00153                               return( false );
00154                         }
00155                         
00156                         foreach( $TemplateList as $tl )
00157                         {
00158                               $List .= '<tr><td>'.$tl[ 'name' ].'</td><td>'.$tl[ 'version' ].'</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr>';
00159                         }
00160                         
00161                         $List .= '</table>';
00162                         
00163                         return( $List );
00164                   }
00165                   catch( Exception $e )
00166                   {
00167                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00168                   }
00169             }

00189             function                get_default_template_name()
00190             {
00191                   try
00192                   {
00193                         $Settings = get_package( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00194                         
00195                         $Settings->load_file( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_template_manager_settings' );
00196                         
00197                         $Name = $Settings->get_setting( 'default_template_name' );
00198                         $Version = $Settings->get_setting( 'default_template_version' , 'last' );
00199                         
00200                         return( array( 'name' => $Name , 'version' => $Version ) );
00201                   }
00202                   catch( Exception $e )
00203                   {
00204                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00263             function                get_default_template_version()
00264             {
00265                   try
00266                   {
00267                         $TemplateList = $this->get_template_list();
00268                         
00269                         foreach( $TemplateList as $tl )
00270                         {
00271                               if( $tl[ 'default' ] === 'default' )
00272                               {
00273                                     return( $tl[ 'version' ] );
00274                               }
00275                         }
00276                   }
00277                   catch( Exception $e )
00278                   {
00279                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00309             function                get_template( $TemplateName , $TemplateVersion )
00310             {
00311                   try
00312                   {
00313                         $Template = get_package( "$TemplateName" , "$TemplateVersion" , __FILE__ );
00314                         if( $Template === false )
00315                         {
00319                               $PackageDirectory = $this->get_template_path( $TemplateName , $TemplateVersion );
00320                               
00321                               $Template = get_package( 'template_manager::default_template_script' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00322                               $Template->set_template_path( $PackageDirectory."/unexisting_script.php" );
00323                               
00324                               return( $Template );
00325                         }
00326                         else
00327                         {
00328                               return( $Template );
00329                         }
00330                   }
00331                   catch( Exception $e )
00332                   {
00333                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00334                   }
00335             }
00336             
00363             function                get_template_path( $TemplateName , $TemplateVersion )
00364             {
00365                   try
00366                   {
00367                         return( _get_package_relative_path_ex( $TemplateName , $TemplateVersion ) );
00368                   }
00369                   catch( Exception $e )
00370                   {
00371                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00372                   }
00373             }
